So that he can fully stock his shop, his wife Sajida has applied for a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan. He will use the funds to buy more toys to sell. In this way, he will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She wishes to use part of the revenues to increase his business capital. She thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy toys for her husband to sell in his shop.

loans.name: Hosana

texts.en: Hosana is a 58-year-old mother who has four adult children. They live in a rural community and earn their living through farming. Due to the hardships of life, she also engages in a hog-raising business to earn additional income. She plans to make this business profitable in order to help her husband in providing for the needs of her family. Because she has inadequate capital, she is applying for a loan of PHP 13,000 to buy feed, vitamins and additional pigs to raise. She believes that her loan will enable her to make the business profitable.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and additional pigs to raise.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 36 years old and is married. He and his spouse are blessed with five children. He runs a butcher shop, a business he has been in for five years. He makes a monthly income of KES 40,000. He plans to use the funds from the loan to buy meat to sell in his business, and to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and continue building his home. This is his third loan term with VisionFund Kenya, and he repaid his previous loans successfully. His future hope and dream is to build rental houses on his piece of land.

loans.use: to buy meat for resale.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a 37-year-old married woman with two school-aged children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Evelyn has a business selling Avon products, in the Philippines. Evelyn requested a loan of PHP 6,000 through NWTF to buy more Avon products, such as perfume, bags, shoes, body spray, etc. to sell.

Evelyn has been in this business for 8 years. In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more Avon products, such as perfume, bags, shoes, body spray, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn is 46 years old, married, and has one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Evelyn has a business selling whole roasted pigs in the Philippines. Evelyn applied for a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items such as additional pigs and spices for her business. Evelyn has been in this business for six years. In the future, Evelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs and spices for her business.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 50 years old, married, and blessed with two children aged 19 and 16. Peter has been a farmer growing melons, maize and paw paws in the Marigat area for over 14 years, earning an income of KES 10,000 monthly. With his seventh loan from VisionFund Kenya, of KES 70,000, he plans to buy fertilizer and seeds and to till the land in preparation for the planting season. The profits he earns will be used to pay school fees and to improve the living standards of his family. His dream is to improve their living standards and expand his farming activities.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and prepare for the planting season.

loans.name: Chadi

texts.en:
Chadi is a 29-year-old single man who has been making furniture for the past eleven years. In 2009, he established his current business and he is working hard to develop it as much as he can. 

Chadi is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to increase his business merchandise with newly released textile items and to purchase a sponge necessary to improve the quality of products he manufactures.

He is well known for the high quality of his products, which he manufactures and sells. He is dreaming and working hard to, one day, open a wide showroom that will attract new customers and improve his socioeconomic situation.

loans.use: To increase his business merchandise with newly released textile items and to purchase a sponge necessary to improve the quality of products he manufactures.

loans.name: Annastacia

texts.en:
Annastacia has a primary school, which she has been running for the past three years. She is 59 years old and married. She and her spouse have been blessed with two children. She also supports four people in her family. 

She will be using this loan to buy building materials for constructing more classrooms, in order to expand her school and cater to more children.

This is her third loan term and she has successfully repaid her previous loans. Her hope for the future is to construct more classrooms.

loans.use: To buy building materials for constructing more classrooms.

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en:
Kalsoom is part of a very poor family and she has been living from hand to mouth. There is only one earning person who is contributing to household expenses.

Kalsoom has been saving for many days to buy a new auto rickshaw for her husband, but she does not have enough to cover the cost. Therefore, Kalsoom has requested a loan for her husband, so he can buy a new rickshaw with the contribution of savings. She hopes that her husband will be fully devoted to driving the auto rickshaw and earn sufficient income.

Kalsoom is a 32-year-old woman, living with her three children and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is very happy after taking this loan and thanks Kiva and their field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy a new rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Cyrus

texts.en:
Cyrus is 33 years old and runs a clinic. He also works as a gas vendor. He is married and, together with his spouse, has been blessed with one child who is six years old. He has been in the clinic business for two years and makes a monthly income of KES 30,000. 

He plans to use the loan to add stock, by buying medicine and clinic equipment. He plans to use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for his child. 

This is his first loan term with VisionFund Kenya and his future hopes and dreams are for his family and business to prosper.

loans.use: To buy medicine and clinic equipment.

loans.name: Hermelanda

texts.en:
Hermelanda is 44 years old, married, and has six children, three of whom attend school. She works very hard to provide for them. Hermelanda runs a general store in the Philippines, which she has been doing for two years, selling a variety of items such as shampoo, soft drinks, cooking oil, coffee, sugar, eggs, etc.  

Hermelanda requested a loan from NWTF for 7,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase more items to sell. In the future, Hermelanda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is married and has a manicure and pedicure service business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 28 years and works hard to support her family. 

She requested a 5,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional materials and equipment for her business.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family and to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and equipment

loans.name: Elmer

texts.en: Elmer is a responsible father who has a great ambition for his family. He is 36 years old, married and has three children attending school. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, he aims to strengthen his hog-raising business in order to provide the family's basic necessities. Due to inadequate capital, he is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000.00 to buy hog feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. He hopes that this loan will help him to further improve the business.

loans.use: to buy hog feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Gani

texts.en:
Gani, a 63-year-old father of six, lives in a very poor community with his wife and one of his sons, his daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. Gani provides for his family by cutting and selling wood to his many customers within the community. He is very happy to have the opportunity to work and provide for his family despite his age and health beginning to fail.

Gani is now requesting a loan to purchase a new machine to cut wood. This will help him improve his business and work more efficiently. He wishes to thank Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase a new machine to cut wood

loans.name: Yobana

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicándose al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar, leche, golosinas  entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de leche, gaseosas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This borrower continues to manage a grocery store. She has been in this business for years and is doing well thanks to the effort she puts into her work each day. The borrower is a responsible person who sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, milk, snack foods, and other items. She wants to keep working so that she can continue to support her family.

The borrower is requesting a loan in order to buy milk, sodas, and other products. She is grateful for the loan that has been provided and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy milk, sodas, and other products.

loans.name: Tres Marias Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “TRES MARIAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felicia ella es soltera y tiene 55 años La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 1 año en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de lavandería, negocio de internet, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.

Los socios que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are members of the “TRES MARIAS” communal bank.  This bank is located within the Cusco district, province, and department.

Felicia is 55 years old, single, and works her grocery store business.  She sells personal products such as rice, sugar, milk, and cooking oil and works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm.  She has been doing this for a year and wants to expand her store.  She is asking for a loan to buy milk, sugar, cooking oil, and rice.

The other members wash clothing, provide internet service, and have grocery stores and restaurants.
 
The members whose photo is pasted onto the group photo were not able to attend due to work.
 
She is grateful to those who form part of this dream through this means and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is still happily married to John and her two children are doing fine.

She is still running her electronics shop as well as photocopy and typing services in Kiambu and her business is doing well. Her monthly income has increased to 60,000 shillings after the previous loan.

This will be Jane's third loan with VisionFund Kenya. She plans to use the entire loan to buy photocopy paper and a photocopy machine. She wants to be a successful business lady in the future and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy photocopy papers and a photocopy machine

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a buy and sell of ready to wear clothing business in the Philippines.

Josephine requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of ready to wear clothing to sell.

She has been in this business for eight years now.

Josephine would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more ready to wear clothing to sell

loans.name: Annah

texts.en:
Annah lives in the Nyamira area, an area known for banana growing. She is married and has eight children. She has been doing farming for 15 years. Her primary income comes from the sale of milk, tea, bananas and cereals. She also has a retail business. She really enjoys selling milk, as it brings in good returns. Her biggest challenge is limited funds.

Annah chose Juhudi Kilimo because it accommodates her low income by not charging high interest rates. She wants to purchase milking cans. This asset will enable her to have a good storage area for milk and it will ensure that the milk is safe. This will help alleviate poverty and better her livelihood..

loans.use: to purchase milk cans.

loans.name: Amilcar

texts.es: Amilcar vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y se siente feliz por vivir en esta hermosa ciudad,él  es Medico Tecnológico y trabaja en una ONG de rehabilitación física y en sus horas libres atiende su pequeño consultorio de fisioterapias. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo tarjetas ultrasonidos y aparatos de rehabilitación.
texts.en:
Amilcar lives in the beautiful city of Cusco in the south of Peru. He feels very Iucky to live in such a lovely pace. He is a medical technician and works for an NGO in the field of physical rehabilitation. In his free time Amilcar works in his small physiotherapy consulting business.

He now needs a loan to buy ultrasound equipment and rehabilitation aids.

loans.use: Buy ultrasound equipment and rehabilitation aids

loans.name: Gladys María

texts.es:
Gladys, una mujer de 31 años de edad, es madre soltera de 4 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con mucho empeño y sacrificio, pues debe trabajar arduas jornadas para generar ingresos con los que su familia pueda sobrevivir.
Durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a trabajar como empleada de oficios varios en diferentes empresas y casas de familia, actualmente alterna su empleo con la venta de mercancía, labor que comenzó desde hace 3 años con el fin de complementar los ingresos para brindar educación y sustento a sus hijos; Sin embargo, en octubre de 2013 su economía decayó por una grave afectación de salud que la aisló de su empleo y su negocio independiente; pero con la motivación y el amor a su familia, logró recuperarse y quiere reiniciar sus labores.
Esto la impulsa a solicitar el crédito con el que comprará surtido al por mayor (perfumería, accesorios, cosméticos, prendas de vestir), esto le permitirá generar nuevamente los ingresos para solventar los gastos familiares, además de satisfacer las necesidades y gustos de sus clientes.
Gladys dice que su mayor anhelo es lograr tener una estabilidad económica que le permita brindar una mejor educación a sus hijos, para que se forjen un futuro próspero y exitoso, además desea disfrutar junto a ellos de mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Gladys, 31 years old, is a single mother of 4 children for whom she has been working hard with much sacrifice to get ahead. She must work very arduous hours in order to earn enough income for her family to survive. 

Gladys has worked as a multi-purpose employee for different businesses and homes in her area, and currently alternates this work with the sale of different merchandise. She has been working in sales for the past 3 years in order to augment her income and provide education and support for her children. Nevertheless, in October of 2013 her economic situation declined as a result of a severe health problem that restricted her ability to work. However, with the motivation and love from her family, she was able to recover and she now wants to begin working again. 

As a result, she is asking for this loan in order to buy wholesale merchandise such as perfume, accessories, cosmetics, and articles of clothing. This will permit her to once again generate the income she needs to support her family expenses, as well as to satisfy the needs and desires of her clients. 

Gladys says that her greatest wish is to have the economic stability that will enable her to provide a better education for her children, so that they will forge a prosperous and successful future. Additionally, she would like to provide them with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a variety of wholesale goods (such as perfumes, accessories, cosmetics, and articles of clothing)

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María, es una maestra casada, su esposo tiene 60 años, sus hijos tienen 18 y 12 años de edad, es empleada y además tiene un negocio de venta de ropa, flores, hamacas, entre otros productos, ya tiene 10 años de poseer su negocio, es apoyada por su esposo.
Con el préstamo efectuara la compra de pantalones, vestidos, blusas, camisas, ropa interior, flores, hamacas, entre otros artículos que sus clientes necesiten, dicha inversión le ayuda a fortalecer su negocio y tener los recursos económicos para cancelar las cuotas y forjar un mejor patrimonio familiar.
Sus aspiraciones son que sus hijos tengan acceso a una carrera universitaria y crecer con su negocio para mejorar el estilo de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María is a married woman. Her husband is 60 years old and her children are 12 and 18 years old. She works as a housekeeper in addition to having her own business selling clothes, flowers, and hammocks among other things. She has had this business for over 10 years, and is helped by her husband. 

With the loan that she is requesting, María will buy pants, dresses, blouses, shirts, underwear, flowers, and hammocks, among other items that her clients need. This investment will help her to strengthen her business and have the economic resources to repay her loan. It will also enable her to improve her family's net worth. 

María's goal is for her children to have access to a university education, and to grow with her business so that her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pants, dresses, blouses, shirts, underwear, flowers, and hammocks among other items

loans.name: Skender

texts.en:
Skender wants to thank all who provided funding for his first loan, which enabled him to purchase some new tools for his tractor, which he uses to transport wood. The loan helped to improve his family’s living conditions and increased his business

Now Skender is requesting a new loan in order to buy a piece of land on the mountain so he can continue to cut the wood there and sell it for heating in the winters. He is very satisfied with his income and his experience with the lenders and is very grateful for the opportunity to be able to continue to work and provide for his family.

loans.use: To buy a piece of land on the mountain so he can continue to cut wood

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs and pay for labor for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Haminton Alex

texts.es:
Haminton Alex es un joven emprendedor, y muy alegre de 21 años de edad, estudiante de la carrera profesional  de Marketing en una Universidad privada en la capital.
El, además de estudiar trabaja para poder solventar sus estudios , tiene  trabajos eventuales en Call Center, servicio al cliente en telefonia al extranjero por que domina muy bién el inglés.

Haminton tiene otra pasión que es la música y practica tocar la guitarra y la bateria en sus horas libres.
En el futuro piensa emprender su propio negocio en publicidad y marketing y ser uno de los mejores a nivel nacional e internacional.

El está muy sorprendido y a la vez agradecido por el apoyo que los inversionistas de Kiva le ofrecen.
texts.en:
Haminton Alex is an entrepreneurial young man, 21 years old, who is studying marketing at a private university in the capital. In addition, to support his studies, he works part time at a Call Center in international client service because he speaks English very well. 

Haminton's other passion is music, and he practices guitar and drums in his free time. 

In the future, he is thinking of starting his own business in publicity and marketing, and hopes to be one of the best nationally and internationally. 

He is very surprised and at the same time very grateful for the support that KIVA investors offer to him.

loans.use: to pay tuition and living expenses

loans.name: Jose Irene

texts.es:
José, vive en un ambiente hogareño en el que disfruta a su familia integrada por su esposa y un hijo, junto a su esposa emprendieron un proyecto para tener los ingresos necesarios para salir adelante, el cual consiste en una granja de pollos y cerdos, trabaja todos los días, su ventaja es que lo posee en su propia residencia.
El crédito lo utilizara para comprar concentrado para los pollos y cerdos, el resto le ayudara a mejorar las instalaciones de la granja, espera dar un mejor cuido a sus animales para venderlos a mejor precio y aumentar sus ganancias.
Para José es importante tener un negocio más amplio que le de buenas ganancias para cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas, mejorar el estilo de vida de su familia y dar a su hijo la oportunidad de educación de calidad para que tenga mejores oportunidades en el mundo laboral.
texts.en:
José lives in a residential area with his family, which consists of his wife and son. Along with his wife, he has started a project in order to increase the family's income and get ahead in life, which consists of raising chickens and pigs. He works every day, and his advantage is that he raises his animals on the property of his own home. 

The loan that he is asking for will be used to buy feed for the chickens and pigs. He will also use some of the money to make improvements to the area in which he raises the animals. He hopes to be able to take better care of the animals in order to sell them for a higher price and improve his earnings. 

For José, it is very important to grow the business so that he can make a good living and repay the loan on time. He will be able to improve the standard of living of his family, and give his son a better education so he has better opportunities in the workforce.

loans.use: to buy feed for chickens and pigs

loans.name: Juana Carelia

texts.es:
Juana de 39 años de edad, madres solteras con dos hijos menores de edad, es originaria del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de norte del país, se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable, con ganas de superación personal.  En sus ratos libre le gusta disfruta de la compañía de sus hijos y pasar tiempo de calidad. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar sus estudios y se vio en la necesidad de trabajar desde temprana edad. En  la actualidad lucha día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.

Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad una mini libreria, negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacion, ella dedica a su negocio unas 1o horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. EL objetivo del credito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles como: cuadernos, lapiceros, corrector, marcadores, crayolas, cartulinas, papel lustrio. para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Juana agrdece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y paises pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Juana is 39 years old and is the single mother of two small children. She is originally from Sauce, a region in the north of the country that is known for its hardworking, responsible residents. In her free time, Juana enjoys spending quality time in the the company of her children. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources, Juana was not able to finish her studies since she had to begin working at a young age. Currently, she is working hard every day to provide a better future for her children. 

Thanks to her hard work and desire to get ahead, Juna has opened a small bookstore, a business that is located in a room of her home. She works offering her products approximately 10 hours a day. With the loan that she is asking for, she will stock her business with supplies such as notebooks, pencils, white-out, markers, crayons, cardboard, and colored paper, so that she can improve her income in the near future. Juana is very grateful for the help that KIVA lenders provide to low income people in poor countries like Nicaragua, so that borrowers can have a dignified way to make a living.

loans.use: to stock her business with supplies such as notebooks, pencils, white-out, markers, crayons, colored paper, and cardboard

loans.name: Boban

texts.en:
Boban is a 43-year-old father of two children, 11 and 15 years old, both of whom attend school. His wife is a nurse who works in a clinic. A very hardworking man who does everything he can in order to improve the living conditions of his family, Boban works for a private TV company as a cameraman and also owns a photography business. 

For more than eight years now, Boban has been able to effectively manage his private business in which he is hired to take photos at various celebrations and events. Because he is very talented and creative, he is well known in the area and has many customers. 

Boban is now requesting a loan to purchase a new photo machine for his work; he believes the purchase will enhance his clients' experiences and the quality of work he can offer. The resulting additional profits will help to ensure a better education and life for his children.

loans.use: To purchase a new photo machine for his work

loans.name: Ana Doneyda

texts.es:
Ana de de 27 años de edad, madres soltera con dos hijos menores de edad, que estudian en la escuela  primaria, es originaria de Malpaisillo, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región, se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación personal, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar enfermería. En la actualidad lucha para brindarle un futuro mejor a sus hijos. 

Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económicala la venta y crianza de cerdos en pie, ella dedica a su negocio unas 10 horas diarias, en su casa de habitacion. el objetivo del credito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de un lote de cerdos para la crianza, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Ana agradece la ayuda que los invesionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y paises pobre como es  Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Ana is 27 years old and a single mother of two young children who are studying at primary school. She is originally form Malpaisillo, an area located in the northern region of the country. Residents of this region are known for being hardworking, responsible, and for having a great desire to get ahead. Unfortunately, Ana was unable to study due to a lack of economic resources, but she would have enjoyed studying to be a nurse. Currently, she works very hard to provide a better future for her children. 

Thanks to her hard work and desire to get ahead, Ana works raising and selling pigs. She dedicates herself to this work for 10 hours a day in the back of her home. With the loan she is asking for, she will buy more pigs to raise, so that in the near future she will be able to improve her income. Ana is very grateful to KIVA lenders who provide low income people in poor countries like Nicaragua the opportunity to work in a dignified way.

loans.use: to purchase pigs to raise and sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, pigs, and pig feed

loans.name: Elvis Noel

texts.es:
Elvis de 27 años de edad, soltero con un hijo menor de edad, es originario del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región. Se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable, con ganas de superación personal, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio en la necesidad de trabajar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos de hogar. En la actualidad lucha día a día para brindarles a sus hijos todas las oportunidades que él no tubo, y así cumplir sus sueños como es poder pagar a su hijo una buena educación para ayudar a formarlos como hombres de bien para la sociedad.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad  económica  la venta de comida en su casa de habitación, comida casera como: carne tapada, pollo frito, empanizado, torta de carne, arroz relleno, maduros, manuelitas, torta de maduros, carne con papas, canelones. El dedica  a su negocio unas doce horas diarias desde muy temprano en la mañana para preparar los alimentos necesarios hasta su venta a estudiantes y trabajadores de empresas. El objetivo del crédito es invertiré en materia prima para la elaboración de la comida con productos comestibles como: plátanos, pipián, queso, pollo, carne, frijoles, papas, repollo, tomates, cebollas, carne rojas.  Con el objetivo que en un futuro cercano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Elvis agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
27-year old Elvis is single and has a young son. He is a native of El Sauce located in the northern part of the country. He is known as a hardworking, responsible person who is eager to get ahead in life. Sadly, because of a lack of money, he wasn't able to take any job training courses and had to start work at a young age to help with household expenses. Currently he works hard every day to provide his son with the opportunities that he didn't have. One if his dreams is to pay for a good education for his son to help him grow up to be a good citizen.

Thanks to his efforts and his wish to do well, Elvis has a business selling home-cooked food from his house such as beef stew, fried chicken, breaded meat, meat pie, rice dishes, fried plantains, banana pie, meat with potatoes, cannelloni and other local dishes.

Elvis spends about twelve hours daily at work from early in the morning to prepare the food ready to sell to students and business workers. He plans to spend the loan money on ingredients such as plantain bananas, chili sauce, cheese, meat, beans, potatoes, cabbage, tomatoes, onions etc. as he wishes to earn more money.

Elvis is grateful to Kiva donors who help people from poor countries such as Nicaragua with their businesses.

loans.use: Buy food ingredients for his catering business

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge Luis es un joven de 26 años de edad, soltero con ganas de salir adelante.Estudia la carrera de Derecho hace tres años y trabaja en una moto-taxi en sus ratos libres,el dinero que recibió como préstamo lo utilizara para comprar la computadora y sus materiales que tanto necesita para poder hacer sus trabajos de la Universidad,ya que a venido ahorrando desde hace mucho para poder hacerlo.Jorge Luis tiene grandes ambiciones en la vida y lucha por ellos,su sueño es llegar a ser un magistrado de prestigio; aunque es consciente que su mayor obstáculo es el factor económico, el se siente muy contento y agradecido de que personas como KIVA lo ayuden.Jorge Luis agradece por la confianza y promete que no será en vano el préstamo otorgado.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis is a 26 year old young man who is single and eager to get ahead. He has been studying law for three years and also works as a motorcycle taxi driver in his free time. He will use the loan he received to buy a computer and the material that he needs in order to do his course work at the university since he has been saving for a long time to be able to do so.

Jorge Luis has great ambitions in life and is fighting for them. His dream is to become a renowned judge although he is aware that his major obstacle is an economic one. He is very happy and grateful that people in KIVA are helping him. Jorge Luis appreciates their confidence and promises that the loan will not be in vain.

loans.use: to buy a computer and study materials.

loans.name: Yanira Guadalupe

texts.es: Yanira de 38 años de edad es una pequeña comerciante que vende ropa para adultos y niños. Yanira es casada y tienen 2 hijos de 16 años y 2 años de edad. Yanira está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para reparar el techo de su vivienda; con el dinero invertirá en la compra de lamina galvanizada, clavos y polines metálicos. Espera realizar pronto estos trabajos antes que la época de lluvia regrese.
texts.en: Yanira, 38, is a small trader who sells clothing for adults and children. Yanira is married and has 2 children aged 16 and 2 years old. She is requesting a loan from FUSAI to repair the roof of her house. With the money from this loan, she will invest in the purchase of galvanized sheet metal, nails, and metal supports for rafters. She expects to perform this work soon before the rainy season returns.

loans.use: to repair her house's roof before the rainy season.

loans.name: Blanca Delia

texts.es:
Blanca Delia es una joven de 24 años de edad, muy trabajadora, responsable descendiente de una familia de bien y muy luchadora. Ella es una mujer casada y vive junto a su esposo y su único hijo quien esta pequeño en edad escolar.  Junto a su esposo se dedican a la caficultura, cultivo de maíz y frijol etc. Ya que dichas actividades las aprendió desde muy pequeña siendo sus padres quienes le enseñaran a trabajar la tierra. A parte de trabajar la caficultura también se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar. Los cultivos que en compañía de su esposo trabajan están ubicados a 5 kilómetros de distancia de su casa habitación trasladándose se a pie diariamente. Gracias al apoyo tanto moral como financiero Blanca Delia pudo cursar su primaria y secundaria en su totalidad obteniendo el título de bachiller en ciencias y letras.
Sus sueños como madre de familia son apoyar a su hijo en sus estudios para que sea un excelente profesional, superarse como familia y así vivir de la mejor forma posible, así como seguir ampliando sus cultivos de café para poder generar mayores ingresos para su familia y hogar. Por lo que hoy en día Blanca Delia solicita ser apoyada financiera mente para la compra de abono, fertilizantes, foliares, etc. Ya como prioridad en este momento es dar la asistencia y mantenimiento a sus cultivos de café, siendo su economía naciente de este rubro para poder sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca Delia is 24 years old, very hardworking, and is a responsible member of a nice family. She is married and lives with her husband and their son who is in school. Blanca and her husband work growing cafe, as well as cultivating corn and beans. Blanca learned these activities at a very young age because her parrents taught her how to work the earth. In addition to working in the field, Blanca is responsible for the chores at home. The fields where she and her husband work are located 5 kilometers from where they live, and they walk to the fields daily. Thanks to the moral and financial support of her family, Blanca was able to finish her primary and secondary education, obtaining a bachelor's degree in arts and sciences. 

Her dream as a mother is to be able to support her son in his studies so he can become a professional, help her family improve its standards of living, and continue to increase her coffee production in order to improve her family's income. As a result, Blanca is currently asking for a loan in order to buy fertilizer and other agricultural supplies, in order to maintain her coffee crops and help to improve her family's situation.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to tend to her coffee crops

loans.name: Nikola

texts.en:
Nikola is 23 years old, recently married and living with his wife and his parents, who receive a pension. His father works in agriculture and Nikola has been running his own food market for ten years now. He sells different types of food to most of his customers from his neighborhood. He is very polite and has good character, which brings in, and helps him to retain, his customers. He is known for being very friendly and even listening to customer’s problems and life situations. 

Nikola is now requesting a loan in order purchase different varieties of food for his store. It will help him to be able to continue his business and provide the service he is well known for. He hopes to have children in the near future now that he is married and wants to save money for his and their future.

loans.use: to purchase different varieties of food for his store

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a 36-year-old man from Majengo location in Vihiga County. He is married to Mary, who is a business-lady, and he has two children who are 11 and 9 years old respectively. 

He owns a posho (grinding) mill and also sells cereals, a business he has been doing for the last four years. He makes a monthly income of KES 20,000. He is taking his third loan with VisionFund Kenya. He will use the loan to increase his stock of cereals for grinding and later resale. He will use his anticipated profit to plough back into the business.

His hopes are to provide his family with a better future and to become a successful businessman.

loans.use: to increase his stock of cereals for grinding.

loans.name: Las Comadres  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Las Comadres está formado por 12 socias que son amables y muy trabajadoras, laboran en diferentes actividades las  mismas que les permiten mejorar la economía de sus hogares para sacar adelante a sus familias. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por la belleza de sus ríos y su naturaleza, las costumbres y traiciones de su gente y por su gran variada  gastronomía.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Yanneth, tiene 35 años de edad, vive en unión libre y en esa unión ha concebido 3 hijos de 16, 14 y 7 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en el colegio y su último hijo estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad, su esposo presta sus servicios como guardia de seguridad, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando. 
Doña Yanneth trabaja como empleada privada desde hace 4 años. En sus tiempos libres se dedica a la venta de productos naturales. El crédito lo va a invertir en la compra productos naturales. Su meta es crecer en el negocio y brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The credit group Las Comadres consists of 12 members who are all friendly and hardworking. They work in different activities with the same goal to improve the economy of their homes to raise their families. They live in different places in the city of Cuenca, a city known for its beautiful rivers, its natural beauty, the customs and traditions of its people, and its great variety of cuisine. 

One of the members of this group is Yanneth. She is 35 years old and lives with her partner. They have 3 children aged 16, 14, and 7 years old. Her oldest two children are studying in school and her youngest child goes to school in the city. Her husband serves as a security guard. They do not own their own home, they are renting.

Yanneth has worked as a private employee for 4 years. In her free time, she sells natural products. The loan will be invested in buying natural products. Her goal is to grow the business and provide a better future for her children.

loans.use: to purchase natural products to sell.

loans.name: Samer

texts.en:
Samer is a 35-year-old married father of two children. He is a Syrian citizen who is putting much effort into developing his beloved family's living conditions. Samer is employed in two companies (a wedding services company and a glass manufacturing company) to cover his family's increasing needs. Although he has a health problem, he puts much effort in staying capable of accomplishing his work needs.

Samer is requesting a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, to pay for his children's increasing school fees. He is very anxious about this loan and hopes to stay capable of replying to his family's needs and providing them with necessary living needs.

loans.use: To pay for his children's increasing school fees

loans.name: Ruth Mercedes

texts.es: Ruth tiene 63 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene un hijo, ella vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y se siente alegre por vivir en esta ciudad. Ruth es una mujer emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia y su actividad económica principal es trabajar para una entidad pública en el área de Dirección Ejecutiva y le va muy bien, ella pertenece al banco comunal "Huayna Picchu" de la Asociación Arariwa y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para gastos personales como pagar el recibo de luz.
texts.en:
Ruth is 63 years old and happily married. She and her husband have a son. Ruth lives in the beautiful city of Cusco in the south of Peru and feels very fortunate to live there. She is an enterprising woman and works hard to help her family get ahead. She works for a public entity in the field of Executive Management and is doing well. 

Ruth belongs to the Huayna Picchu Community Bank, part of the Asociación Arariwa. She needs a loan to pay for personal expenses such as the electricity bill.

loans.use: Pay for personal expenses such as her electricity bill

loans.name: Leonor De Las Mercedes

texts.es: Leonor tiene 55 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus nietos de 18 años y 8 años de edad. Ella trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia y dar mejores condiciones. Leonor solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la luz eléctrica y para la construcción de dos paredes en la vivienda para lo cual comprará materiales como: arena, ladrillo, cemento y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso.
texts.en: Leonor is 55 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their grandchildren ages 18 and 8 years old. She works very hard to help her family get ahead and improve their living conditions. Leonor is asking for this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the installation of electric light, as well as to construct two walls in their home for which she must buy sand, bricks, cement, and iron rods. She hopes that she will receive this loan since otherwise she does not have the necessary capital to invest in these projects.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and iron rods to construct two walls in her home, and to install electric energy

loans.name: Reyna Maribel

texts.es:
Reyna, ha mejorado mucho sus ingresos por la utilización de créditos, la inversión anterior le permitió aumentar los productos frescos y de calidad, con lo que la rentabilidad de su negocio fue mucho más positiva.
Se ha decidió por solicitar un crédito nuevo con el fin de continuar dando a sus clientes un buen servicio; en esta ocasión invertirá en la compra de chorizo, carne y hueso de res.
texts.en:
Reyna has improved her income significantly thanks to previous loans. With her last loan she was able to buy fresh and high quality products, which increased the profitability of her business. 

She has now decided to request a new loan in order to continue giving her clients the best service she can. This time, she will purchase sausage, meat, and cow bones.

loans.use: to buy sausage, meat and cow bones

loans.name: Arely

texts.es:
Arely, necesita más capital para efectuar la compra de arroz, frijol, verduras, maíz, golosinas, bebidas, gas propano, sal, condimentos, carnes, aceite, etc., para surtir la tienda y continuar vendiendo tortillas y comida, de esta manera tendrá la materia prima para su negocio.
Con el crédito anterior tuvo los recursos económicos para adquirir la mercadería necesaria para que su negocio se fortaleciera se mantuviera activo y así tener mejores ganancias las cuales ha utilizado para cancelar su deuda y apoyar a su esposo en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Arely needs more capital in order to purchas rice, beans, vegetables, corn, sweets, drinks, propane gas, salt, condiments, meats, cooking oil, etc. in order to stock her store and continue selling tortillas and food. With these items, she will have the goods that she needs for her business. 

With her previous loan, Arley was able to acquire the necessary merchandise to strengthen her business and maintain active. She was able to improve her earnings which she used to repay her debt and support her husband with their family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, vegetables, corn, sweets, drinks, propane gas, salt, condiments, meat, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Dobrila

texts.en:
Dobrila wants to thank all of the lenders for the previous loan she was granted in order to purchase products and bags for her business. Now she is again requesting a loan for the same business to again purchase various items to sell in her shop. 

Overall Dobrila is very pleased with her business and the success and profit that she sees.  She has been very pleased with the help she received in the past from the lenders. She wants to thank again all Kiva lenders for their support!

loans.use: to purchase various items to sell in her shop

loans.name: El Proyecto Group

texts.es:
El proyecto está conformado por nueve integrantes, ocho mujeres y un hombre, madres y padres responsables con veinte hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Es originario de Malpaisillo lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañia de sus hijos. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos  no pudieron cursar una carrera y se vieron en la obligación de trabajar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos del hogar.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora es Petrona y    tiene por actividad económica una pulpería es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, jugos, galletas, gaseosas, verduras, fósforos. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El proyecto agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y pises pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
This group comprises nine members, eight female and one male. They are all responsible parents and have twenty children in all under their charge. They are from Malpaisillo, which is located in the northern area of the region. They are known to be hardworking, responsible, and eager to improve themselves. They enjoy spending their free time in the company of their children. Unfortunately, due to lacking financial resources, they were not able to stay in school but had to start working when they were quite young in order to help out with household expenses. 

Thanks to her effort and her drive to get ahead, Petrona is the coordinator. Her business is a grocery store. It is a small store selling grocery items in small amounts, like rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, juice, cookies, soda, vegetables, and matches. Her business is set up in her home. The purpose of this loan is to invest in working capital and stock her grocery store in order to obtain better income in a not-too-distant future. 

The group is grateful for the help that Kiva investors offer to people with scarce resources in poor countries like Nicaragua to earn an honest and decent living.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and stock up on grocery items.

loans.name: Toshtemir

texts.en:
Toshtemir, 32 years old, is a young and industrious man. He is married and has 3 small children. Toshtemir began his own business growing wheat, cotton, onion, potatoes, carrots, maize, etc. 5 years ago. He has 8 hectares of sowing land. Toshtemir’s wife and some of his relatives help him to grow agricultural products. 

Toshtemir lives with his wife, children, parents and brother. He has a big family. He uses his income to provide his family with all necessary things. Toshtemir is going to make a new sowing but he doesn't have enough money to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel. He is asking for a loan of 5,000 TJS (Somoni) to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Slavica

texts.en:
Slavica is 53 years old and a divorced, independent woman. She lives in a minority community of Kosovo with her 12 –year-old son. For quite some time, she has been working in an agricultural business growing vegetables on her land, and then selling the products in her area in order to make a living. She has a green house and she wants to build another one because she has a lot of business and a lot of profit. 

Now Slavica is asking for a loan to purchase materials in order to build another green house. She hopes that this will help her to live an even better lifestyle and quality of life. She hopes to keep on making her own living and not having to ask others for money or rely on others for assistance. Her goal is to give a better education to her son. Slavica is very grateful to all of the Kiva lenders!

loans.use: to purchase materials in order to build another green house

loans.name: Sr. De Huanca De San Jeronimo Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SR. DE HUANCA DE SAN JERONIMO” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Todos los socios viven en la encantadora ciudad del Cusco que esta ubicado al sur de Perú y se sienten contentos de vivir en esta ciudad porque es maravillosa y tiene hermosos paisajes.  

Rosalinda tiene 30 años y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo. Su actividad económica de Rosalinda es la elaboración de bocaditos, pasteles y tortas. Desde hace un año que pertenece al banco comunal y le va muy bien entonces en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar un horno industrial.  

Los demás socios se dedican al negocio de crianza de animales menores como gallinas y cuyes,  pero otros socios brindan servicios transportes en sus propias carros. 

Los socios agradecen a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These borrowers belong to the lending group "Sr. de Huanca de San Jeronimo", of the Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco. All of the members live in the enchanting city of Cusco which is located in southern Peru. The members feel very happy to live in this wonderful city with its beautiful countryside. 

Rosalinda is 30 years old and has two children. She is a hardworking and entrepreneurial woman, who works hard to get ahead with her family. Rosalinda works making bread, cakes, and other desserts. She has been a member of this lending group for over a year, and she has been doing very well. On this occasion, she is borrowing in order to buy an industrial oven. 

The other members of the group work raising small animals such as hens and guinea pigs, or offering transportation service in their own vehicles. 

The members of this group are very grateful to those who help them achieve their goals, and they promise to pay all loan repayments when due.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en: Jonalyn, 31 years old, is engaged in buying and reselling fruits and vegetables within her community. She is married but has no children yet. Jonalyn and her husband aim to become successful and  financially stable in the future. To attain their goal, Jonalyn plans to improve and strengthen the business. She is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000.00 to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables to resell in the market. Through patience and hard work, she believes that she will make improvements in the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables to resell

location.town: Brgy. Ineangan, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Saul Eduardo

texts.es: Saúl de 30 años de edad está acompañado y tienen dos hijos; un niño de 7 años y una niña de 3 años de edad. Saúl trabaja como jornalero en una finca de su localidad. Su compañera de vida trabaja de oficios doméstico. Saúl ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar e instalar los polines y la lámina galvanizada para la cubierta del techo de su vivienda. Saúl pretende continuar mejorando su vivienda y a corto plazo repellar las paredes e instalar el ladrillo de piso por lo que sabe que al cumplir con las cuotas que implica este crédito FUSAI le seguirá apoyando.
texts.en:
Saúl, 30 years old, has a partner and they have two children, a boy, who is 7, and a girl, who is 3 years old. Saúl works as a day laborer on a farm in the area. His life companion is a domestic worker.

Saúl has requested a loan from FUSAI in order to purchase and install purlins and galvanized sheets to cover the roof of his house. Saúl intends to continue improving his dwelling. In the short term he wants to plaster his walls and install a brick floor. He knows that when he makes his repayments on time, as required by this loan, FUSAI will continue to assist him.

loans.use: to purchase metal purlins and galvanized metal sheets to cover the roof of his dwelling.

loans.name: Angela Ludilma

texts.es: Angela de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos; uno de 14 años de edad y una niña de 6 años. Angela trabaja a domicilio de lavado y planchado. Con lo que gana aporta a los gastos de alimentación para su familia. Angela y su esposo han estado invirtiendo de poco a poco en la mejora de su vivienda, levantando algunas paredes y repellandolas. Ahora Angela quiere hacer otro esfuerzo más para introducir la energía eléctrica en su vivienda pero no tiene el monto total de la inversión. Por lo anterior Angela está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI y así terminar el cableado e instalación de la energía eléctrica de su vivienda. Sabe que al tener energía eléctrica en su vivienda a sus hijos se les facilitará más las labores de estudios por la noche y a ella los quehaceres del hogar.
texts.en: Angela is 31 years old and lives at home with her life partner and their two children, a 14 year old boy and a 6 year old girl. Angela works at home, doing laundry. She uses her earnings to pay for food for her family. Angela and her husband have been gradually investing in improving their home, raising some walls and plastering them. Angelia wants to make another effort now to introduce more electricity into her home but she does not have the total amount needed for the investment. Therefore, Angelia is requesting a loan from FUSAI to wire and install electricity in her home. She knows that having electricity in her house will allow her children to have more light to study and she can have more work hours for her household chores.

loans.use: to install electricity in her home.

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es: José de 51 años de edad, es un hombre muy trabajador que vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 16 años de edad. Él trabaja como ordenanza en una empresa privada de la localidad, su compañera de vida tiene un pequeño negocio de ventas de tortillas. José ha decidido invertir en su vivienda  construir un área de cocina y mejora el baño; por lo que ha solicitado a FUSAI un crédito para comprar Cemento, ladrillo de barro, hierro,arena y grava para construir la cocina y mejorar el área de baño. El se compromete a cancelar todas las cuotas que este crédito implica.
texts.en: José, 51, is a hardworking man who lives with his life partner and his 16 year old son. He works as an assistant in a local private company. His life partner has a small business selling tortillas. José decided to invest in his home, building a kitchen and improving their bathroom. He has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, brick, clay, iron, sand, and gravel to build and improve the kitchen and bathroom. He agrees to pay all his repayments involved in this loan.

loans.use: to build a kitchen in his house.

loans.name: Deysi Aracely

texts.es:
Deysi, se siente satisfecha por los resultados positivos que tuvo con el crédito anterior, pues compro la materia prima para continuar elaborando las tortillas y panqué, así como también diferentes animales (cerdos, gallinas y pericos) y alimento para estos, que luego ha ido vendiendo, teniendo así mejores ganancias, las cuales utiliza para cancelar sus deudas y mejorar el estilo de vida de su familia.
Actualmente solicita más capital para comprar maíz, leña, harina, cerdos, gallinas, pericos y alimento para los mismos, de esta manera su negocio irá creciendo poco a poco, contara con clientes más satisfechos y ofrecerá nuevas oportunidades de superación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Deysi is very satisfied with the positive results she obtained with her previous loan. She was able to buy the ingredients she needed to continue to make tortillas and pancakes, as well as to buy different animals (pigs, hens, and parakeets) and animal feed. She was later able to sell the animals to improve her income, which she has been using to repay her debts and improve her family's quality of life. 

She is currently asking for a new loan in order to buy more corn, firewood, flour, pigs, hens, parakeets, and animal feed. This way, she will improve her business little by little, and have more satisfied clients. She will be able to offer more opportunities to her children.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, flour, pigs, hens, parakeets, and animal feed

loans.name: Veton

texts.en: Veton wants to thank all of the lenders for the previous loan, which he used to purchase bicycles to sell. The loan has helped him to grow his business and be able to generate more income for his family. Now he is asking again for a loan for the same business and same purpose. He was very satisfied and happy to have received the first loan and the results that he saw, so he is eager to be able to borrow again. Veton hopes to expand his business even further in the future and wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: to buy bicycles to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock her store with vegetables, grains, sugar, cookies, and sweets

loans.name: Tahzeem

texts.en:
Tahzeem, 50 years old, is an active borrower of Kiva and BRAC Pakistan. She is the mother of seven children. Her husband has owned and operated an auto spare parts shop for the past fifteen years. Tahzeem's husband wants to expand his business so that he can fulfill his customers' daily demands and provide better reselling services of spare parts. Due to financial problems, he is not in a position to bear the expenses regarding the business expansion.

Tahzeem has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to afford all relevant expenses for his business expansion and to buy the relevant items in bulk to fulfill his customers' needs. Tahzeem is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for this financial assistance.

loans.use: To buy different  types of spare automobile parts to resell

loans.name: Santos Hilario

texts.es: Santos de 38 años de edad, trabaja como vigilante en una fabrica de su localidad desde hace 5 años. Junto a su esposa han procreado 3 hijos; dos hijas de 11 y 7 años de edad y un varón de 2 años. Su humilde vivienda tiene muchas necesidades pero Santos ha priorizado y realizar cambio de lámina galvanizada de pared y techo, además reforzará la estructura de techo con polines metálicos. Por esa razón Santos ha solicitado crédito a FUSAI para comprar; lámina galvanizada, clavos, pines y polin metálico. Él sabe que al cumplir con este compromiso que implica este crédito podrá dejar las puertas abiertas para solicitar otros desembolso y seguir mejorando las condiciones de su vivienda, para bien de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Santos, 38 years old, has been working as a security guard at a factory in his area for five years. He and his wife have procreated three children: two daughters, who are 11 and 7 years old, and a son, who is two years old. 

His modest home requires many improvements, however Santos has prioritized the changes by installing galvanized sheets on his walls and roof. In addition, he will strengthen the roof’s structure with metal purlins. Consequently Santos has requested a loan from FUSAI to purchase galvanized sheets, nails, pine and metallic purlins. 

He knows that upon meeting his commitments with this loan, he will leave the door open to request other funding so that he can continue improving conditions in his home that will benefit his entire family.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheets to repair the walls and roof of his dwelling.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a 41-year-old married mother of four children. She started her own fruits and vegetables sales business eight months ago to support her beloved husband in covering their children's increasing needs. Sarah is a hard worker. She also works as a housekeeper, providing cleaning services to many people, to improve her family's socioeconomic situation.

Sarah is now acquiring a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, to buy a ready-built room to use as her own fruits and vegetables sales shop instead of selling her goods at home. This will make her business development easier and the shop will be more visible to many other customers. Sarah hopes to stay capable of running and developing her existing business, so that one day she can depend on it as her only source for living and stop her cleaning services.

loans.use: To buy a ready-built room to use as her own shop

loans.name: Dúo Mujeres De San Lorenzo El Cubo Group

texts.es: dúo mujeres de san Lorenzo, doña Catarina quien solicita su crédito para invertir en sus materiales (alambre, resistol, fajas etc.)  Para  elaborar muñecos quitapenas ya que son utilizados en recuerdos y manualidades típicas y una parte del crédito lo invertirá en cosechar manía ya que esto le ayuda a ella a poder solventar sus gastos económicos ya que ella es viuda y no cuenta con el apoyo de nadie su mayor anhelo es poder tener un ahorro para poder solventar en un futuro sus gastos personales.
texts.en: Catarina, from San Lorenzo, is asking for a loan to purchase the materials she needs to make traditional dolls called "quitapenas". She will buy wire, glue, and cloth among other materials. With the other part of the loan, Catarina will invest in her peanut harvest, which will help her to support her economic expenses. Catarina is a widow who does not have the support of anybody, and her greatest desire is to save enough to support her future personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy the materials to make traditional dolls (quitapenas)

loans.name: Reina De La Paz

texts.es:
Reina, opta por un nuevo crédito para realizar la compra de pollo, salchichas, jamón, lácteos, entre otros productos para satisfacer las peticiones de sus clientes y continuar contando con la fidelidad a su negocio.
El préstamo anterior para Reina fue de gran ayuda para fortalecer su negocio y vender en mayor cantidad, sus utilidades aumentaron, ella pudo abrir otro puesto en el mercado para tener ingresos extras con los que ha solventado sus deudas y ofrece mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Reina is asking for a new loan in order to buy chicken, hot dogs, ham, and milk products, among other goods, to satisfy the needs of her clients and continue building loyalty among her customers. 

Reina used the last loan she received to invest in strengthening her business and sell a greater variety of food. Her profits increased and she was able to open another stall in the market to make extra income. With her earnings, she has been repaying her debts and offering a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy chicken, hot dogs, ham, and milk products among others

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes has a hardware business, which she has been running for six years now, and it has been profitable. She is 40 years old, married to David, and they have been blessed with five children. Her spouse also provides additional income. 

She will be using this loan to add stocks of hardware goods for resale, including iron sheets, steel bars, and pipes among other items. She will use the anticipated profits to repay the loan as well as buy more stocks of cement.

This is her fifth loan term with VisionFund Kenya, and she has paid her previous loans successfully. Her future hope is to become a successful and promising entrepreneur.

loans.use: to add stocks of iron sheets, steel bars, and pipes.

loans.name: Aster Group

texts.en:
C Lalhmangaihi is a middle-aged woman and a divorcee. After her separation from her husband, she moved back to her parent’s home to live with them. She is the featured profile member of the group and she is pictured with her hand raised in the group photo. The group that she joined is called Aster Group. Five women from Mizoram who are persistent and hardworking joined hands and formed the group. Mizoram is one of the northeastern states in India and the tribal community holds the major population in the state.

C Lalhmangaihi was keen to take the leap to be financially independent and self made, but her primary level education could uphold her dreams and instead, she started her own business. She runs a petty shop in the neihborhood and generates income to support her and the family. She sells all essential commodities like rice, a variety of cereals, edible oil, onions, potatoes, candles, kerosene etc. She also sells beauty creams and other accessories like hair clips, hair bands and rubber bands. The peak hour is in the morning, so she opens her shop early in the morning at 6:00 am and usually closes at 10:00 pm. The shop is run solely by her and she hardly gets time to get back home and eat her lunch. So her family members usually come to her petty shop to give her lunch. She spends most of her time in the shop and closes down only if she has important family business. Twice a month, she purchases stock for the shop from the main market in town at the wholesale rate. The generated income is insufficient to manage both the household expenses and shop expenses, which usually forces C Lalhmangaihi to buy the supplies on credit and pay for them later. Trust and loyalty are the most important things to run a business, says C Lalhmangaihi. 

With the help of the Kiva loan, she will purchase supplies for the whole month, sell them and earn an income. She will only remarry and settle down once again when she is fully financially stable and capable of running the business without getting loans. She will work very hard and give all her time to make the business a success. She is also planning to expand the shop and continue the business until the end. She says “ KA LAWM LUTUK”, which means I am so thankful. The other members of the group are also engaged in running grocery shops and other income-generating activities.

loans.use: To purchase more supplies like beauty creams, shampoo sachets and edible oils

loans.name: Maria Altagracia

texts.es:
Doña María Altagracia es una mujer muy trabajadora de 51 años de edad, responsable, dedicada a su familia, hogar y sus cultivos de café los cuales es la única fuente de ingresos para el bienestar de su familia. Ella está casada y vive junto con su esposo y su única hija. A muy temprana edad aprendió a realizar los diferentes trabajos en el campo como: limpieza, poda, aplicación de abono, recolecta del café, entre otras. No descuidando sus quehaceres en el hogar y con su familia ella se involucra junto a su esposo en el campo llevando a cabo algunas de las tareas ya que por la edad no es posible realizar otras que requieren de un mayor esfuerzo físico. La propiedad que en compañía trabaja está ubicada a 5 kilómetros desde su casa de habitación a la cual se traslada diariamente junto con su esposo caminando. Doña María Altagracia tiene un nivel de educación secundario obteniendo su título de secretaria comercial gracias al esfuerzo y sacrificio de sus padres en su juventud lo cual pudo desempeñar poco su profesión por lo que el tiempo de trabajo mayormente ha sido en el campo.
Sus sueños son superarse como familia, darle una mejor educación a su hija para que tenga una mejor calidad de vida en su futuro y sea una mujer preparada académicamente y con mucho conocimiento. Doña María Altagracia solicita ayuda para la compra de abono, fertilizantes, foliares, etc. ya que es necesario asistir sus cultivos para evitar que estos puedan ser deteriorados por las diferentes enfermedades que deterioran a los mismo como la roya, la broca como bicho entre otros.
texts.en:
María Altagracia is a hardworking woman of 51 years. She is responsible and dedicated to her family, home, and the coffee crops that are her family's only source of income for the welfare of her family. She is married and lives with her husband and their only daughter. At an early age, she learned to perform different types of jobs in the field such as cleaning, pruning, applying fertilizer, harvesting coffee, and more. She works in the field with her husband without neglecting her chores at home and with her family. She carries out some of the tasks except for those that are not possible because of her age and their requirement of more physical exertion. They work at their property 5 kilometers from their home. She commutes on foot with her husband. María Altagracia has a secondary level of education and obtained training as a commercial secretary through the efforts and sacrifice of her parents in hope that she might be a professional one day but she has mostly worked in the fields.

Her dreams are to succeed as a family, to give a better education to her daughter to have a better quality of life in her future as a woman who is academically prepared and knowledgeable. María Altragracia requests help in purchasing fertilizer, manure, and more since they are necessary to help their crops avoid diseases and pests.

loans.use: to fertilizer her coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabric .

loans.name: Ana Morelia

texts.es: Ana de 59 años de edad habita en casa propia y se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace más de 10 años. Ana desea reparar las condiciones de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina y madera para cambiar el techo y reparar las paredes de la vivienda dado que el material que tiene se encuentra deteriorado. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento dado que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso por su cuenta pero si con la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Ana is 59 years old and lives in her own home. For the past 10 years, she has been working as a domestic housekeeper. Ana hopes to improve the conditions of her home, which is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy sheet metal and wood to change the roof and repair the walls of her house. The current material has become very deteriorated. She hopes to receive this loan since she does not currently have the available resources to undertake this project on her own.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal and wood to repair the roof and the walls of her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, milk powder, cereal, juice, soda, meat, chicken, and cleaning products

loans.name: Zarnigor

texts.en: Zarnigor is a smart woman. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a businessman. Zarnigor lives in a village and she always has wanted to organize her own business. She took part in a competition called ‘The best business plan’, organized by the Association of Business Women. She wrote the best business plan. She is going to open a beauty salon. She is asking for a loan of 3,500 USD to buy equipment for her beauty salon and to repair the site of her salon. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy equipment and to repair the site of her new beauty salon

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy retail stock including flour, rice and sugar.

loans.name: Ömür

texts.en:
Ömür is 45 with a 23-year-old daughter and a 17-year-old son. Because her husband is a police officer, the family has lived in several different Turkish cities and developed strong friendships.  For 10 years, she has made and sold manti (Turkish ravioli), borek (savory pastry), stuffed grape leaves, tarhana (preserved yogurt soup), jellies and pepper and tomato sauces. She first began by selling to friends and relatives. They liked her products because they had a homemade, "like Mom used to make", taste. She ships orders.  In the summer, expatriates from Germany, the US, UK, and Czech Republic buy her products to take home. Her daughter is studying food engineering and will help her mother when she finishes her studies. Ömür sells from her home and sometimes at markets. She wants to open a small shop that serves breakfast in the morning and manti in the afternoon. She also wants to sell dried manti by the kilo. She would like to sell her products abroad.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Ömür Hanım,45 yaşında ,23 yaşında bir kızı 17 yaşında bir oğlu var.  Eşi polis olduğu için Türkiye'nin bazı şehirlerini dolasmış, güzel dostluklar ve arkadaşlıklar kurmuşlar.  10 yıldır evde mantı,börek,yaprak sarma tarhana,reçel ,biber ve domatesten sos yaparak satıyor.  İlk akraba ve komşulara satarak başlıyor. Yaptığı ürünler ev ve anne tadında olduğu için beğeniliyor.  Aldığı siparişleri kargo ile yolluyor.  Yazın gezmeye gelen gurbetçiler Almanya,Amerika,İngiltere,Çek Cumhuriyeti ürünlerini satın alarak yurt dışına götürüyor.  Kızı gıda mühendisliğinde okuyor ,okulu bitirmek üzere annesine desteği oluyor.  Satışlarını evden ve zaman zaman pazardan yapıyor.  Ķüçük bir işyeri açıp sabah kahvaltı ,öğlen mantı vermek istiyor. Ayrıca kilo ile mantı satmak istiyor.  Ürünlerini yurt dışınada pazarlamak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: Voeun

texts.en:
Voeun is a 65-year-old farmer from the village of Kang Meas district, Kampong Cham. He is married to Yeang, a farmer, and together they have given birth to three children, all of whom are now grown-up. 

Voeun has been engaged in a farming business, which is the family's traditional business and major source of income. Having been in this field for years, he is able to make a daily income of USD 5 per day.

Voeun had planned to improve his household sanitation practices in order to promote the family's health. Due to inadequate money, he is asking for a loan to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank for the sake of his family members. 

Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Voeun is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of his family, and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank for the sake of his family members.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a 41-year-old lady from Kakamega, married to Paul, with whom she has three children, ages 14, 7, and 2 years.

She sells curtains, earning a monthly income of KES 75,000. This is the third loan she is taking with Vision fund Kenya; a loan of KES 67,500 to use in expanding her business. The anticipated profits will be used to buy more rolls of curtains and nets, then use part of it to repay her loan.

Her dream is to become a supplier and bring up a stable family

loans.use: to purchase rolls of curtains and nets to resell to her clients.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is a 50-year-old lady and an active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. She is a mother of two sons and three daughters. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her family. Her husband is the guardian of her entire family and responsible for managing the household. One of her sons has been doing the business of candy-making for the past seven years. He also contributes his income with his father to fulfill the needs of the entire family.
 
Nasreen's son needs different kinds of ingredients, e.g.: sugar, glucose, honey, and various types of flavors for the purpose of making candy; but due to financial constraints, her son is not in a suitable position to buy these ingredients for his business purpose. Therefore, Nasreen has applied for a Kiva loan from it's field partner, BRAC Pakistan. 

With the help of this loan, her son can fulfill his business need by purchasing relevant items and ingredients.
For this financial assistance, Nasreen is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy different types of ingredients for making candy for her son's business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to maintain her coffee crops

loans.name: Nargis

texts.en:
Nargis is a 42-year-old woman, and lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her five children. Her husband has been working in a cement factory for many years, and is responsible for meeting the needs of the family. Nargis contributes to management of their house hold by providing sewing services to earn an income. 

Nargis needs different kinds of goods for her business (needles, threads, pieces of cloth, machine oil, etc.), but due to insufficient financial means she is unable to purchase these accessories. Therefore she has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her to purchase these accessories and also help her to increase her monthly sales and profit by providing better sewing services. Nargis is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy accessories for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en:
Musarat is an active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. She lives with her five children and husband in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband is the guardian of her family. He has been running his own scrap business for the past ten years.
 
Musarat's husband wants to purchase scrap material for his business purpose, but due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to purchase the scrape in bulk. Therefore, Musarat has applied for a Kiva loan from it's field partner, BRAC Pakistan. 

With the help of this loan she'll enable her husband to purchase scrap material for his business purpose so that he can earn more profitable income to manage his business and household.

Musarat is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.
